scenes.text: Hello, we are Cardiff University's Womens basketball club.we have 4 teams: 1st, 2a, 2b and team 3. We are a Tier 1 club! We have all sorts of events and tournaments for all skill levels and look forward to helping people find a passion for basketball, find friends and just enjoy themselves!

We have trainings for each of our teams weekly, as well as a development session each week if you don't really fancy fixtures and want to just play for fun! 

Games and socials are usually on Wednesdays, and vary in location, but all training sessions are run at the Talybont sports village. 

Our training schedule is on our SU page!
Since we are a Tier 1 club you have to pay the Tier 1 AU fee, and our membership is Â£46.00.
We have games, sessions and tournaments frequently as social events, as well as give it a gos. For details on other socials we may be running we post on our instagram page and SU page.
